content.title: Uses
content.description: A fast-growing medicinal tree attains moderate to large height up to 30 m with girth of 1.2 to 4.5 m with a clear bole of 9-15 m. The root decoction is used in folk remedies for abdominaltumours in India. Ayurveda recommends for alopecia, anaemia, consumption, leprosy, thirst, and vaginal discharges. Flowers are used for blood disorders & leprosy. Root is anthelmintic, laxative & stomachic, for abdominal pains, burning sensations, fever, hallucinations, piles and urinary discharges.
